content:
3    攻擊時以5%的機率4秒內讓敵人呈現觸電狀態，每次擊時以230的攻擊力給予追加傷害.
(若敵人高於Lv65，則減少進入異常狀態的機率；反之，則增加機率)


[if]

[cooltime]
6000    
[attack success]
1    

[/if]

[then]

[target]
`enemy`
-1    
[duration]
4000    
[probability]
5    
[reduce probability to human armor at pvp module]
80    
[active status]
`lightning`
65    230    
[/then]
